Package cli

Class CommandLine

java.lang.Object
cli.CommandLine
public class CommandLine
extends java.lang.Object
This class is run when launching the game as a command line application. It provides the link between the player interacting with the computer and the actual game code in GameEnviroment.
Author:
fma107

    • nextInt

      private static int nextInt​(java.lang.String message, int minRange, int maxRange)
      Repeatedly prints `message` until the input is an integer between minRange and maxRange
      Parameters:
      message - The message which gets displayed
      minRange - The smallest valid number inclusive
      maxRange - The biggest valid number inclusive
      Returns:
      The user's number

    • getValidName

      public static java.lang.String getValidName()
      Gets a valid (string) name from stdin:

      - Must contain only valid characters (alphabet & spaces)
      Returns:
      The valid name

    • getValidShipChoice

      public static Ship getValidShipChoice​(Ship[] possibleShips)
      Lists & describes the available ships to the player, returning their choice.
      All input/output is though stdin/stdout
      Parameters:
      possibleShips - The ships available to choose from
      Returns:
      The ship that the player chose
